content: this adorable jubilee hat is quick and easy to work up it is made with about caron cakes yarn and is available in several sizes from 0-3 months to adult large this pattern is one of the september contributions to the 2022 hat of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 52-129 yds of category 4 medium weight yarn i used caron cakes in the funfetti colorway * size j 6mm furls streamline galaxy polaris crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
